arts.ttl: Official: Milan loanee Camarda starts in Lecce’s Serie A opener against Genoa
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller AC Milan loanee Francesco Camarda is playing from the first minute in Lecce’s Serie A opener against Genoa, as confirmed by the club earlier this evening. Milan agreed to send Camarda out on loan this summer and after a positive pre-season, finding the back of the net multiple times, the 27-year-old came off the bench […] The post Official: Milan loanee Camarda starts in Lecce’s Serie A opener against Genoa appeared first on SempreMilan.

The new Serie A campaign gets underway on Saturday, as the league returns following an incredible finish to last season, and Aaron Rogan has predictions for all 10 games.

Napoli begin their title defence without the injured Romelu Lukaku, who might not return in 2025. They play newly-promoted Sassuolo. Meanwhile, Milan take on Cremonese and Roma face Bologna.

arts.ttl: Genoa vs. Lecce: season opener at the Marassi
arts.sum: This is the second Genoa-Lecce match in the history of Serie A Enilive on the first day of the championship. At the Stadio Luigi Ferraris, in the neighbourhood of Marassi, Serie A Enilive returns with a clash between Genoa and Lecce.
